comment.author: 69276342@N04
comment._content: This is not Tonga. Upolu is the main island of Samoa (called Western Samoa before 1999 and under New Zealand administration from 1919 until independence in 1972)

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: Thank you for your feedback. We have corrected the descriptions for the images from Samoa and the Cook Islands and have now separated them into their own sets.
